verses.roman:
samasta brahmāṇḍa-gaṇera iṅho antaryāmī
kāraṇābdhiśāyī--saba jagatera svāmī

synonyms: samasta brahmāṇḍa-gaṇera—of the aggregate of the brahmāṇḍas, or universes; iṅho—that Lord Mahā-Viṣṇu; antaryāmī—the Supersoul; kāraṇa-abdhi-śāyī—Lord Mahā-Viṣṇu, lying on the Causal Ocean; saba jagatera—of all the universes; svāmī—the Supreme Lord.
translation: "Mahā-Viṣṇu is the Supersoul of all the universes. Lying on the Causal Ocean, He is the master of all material worlds.
